KnowledgeBase.Title: isObjectVector
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isType isBitVector isFloatVector isIntegerVector isByteVector isIdentical isNumberVector isPcodeVector isVector
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: Vector bit byte bitvector Boolean object

Function.Description: The isObjectVector function returns true if the argument is an Object Vector; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isObjectVector function returns true if the argument {obj} is an Object Vector; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isObjectVector function is a Boolean function that determines if an object is an Object Vector.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes:
Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector,
FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory,
Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex, Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is an Object Vector, otherwise false is returned.
